name: z3-wasm
description: Run Z3 in browser using WebAssembly

scripts.start: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp node_modules/z3-solver/build/z3-built.* dist && parcel
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp node_modules/z3-solver/build/z3-built.* dist && parcel build --public-url=/z3-wasm

author: ViRb3
